title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 98.7 - Information on line extension costs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 98.7 - Information on line extension costs

State Regulations

Each utility shall prepare an information sheet describing
line extension procedures and costs to be given to persons inquiring about line
extensions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
98.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
